citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
Section 2.126(b) - Access and inspection of records and property: A responsible adult shall be made available to
accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:49 a.m. on
03/16/2016.
Upon arriving at the facility, licensee was called by inspector. Licensee notified inspector that he was not currently
on premises and would not be available within 30 minutes.
